titles.title: To make permanent the temporary exemption from duty of the cost of certain foreign repairs made to United States vessels.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E467)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/1/1993--Introduced. Amends the Customs and Trade Act of 1990 to make permanent the exemption from duty of certain foreign repairs made to U.S. vessels that enter the United States.
